title: issue: portals policing project link in 5-4 now redirects to spam website
description: the link to the portals policing project [here](https://github.com/pluralitybook/plurality/blob/main/contents/english/5-4-augmented-deliberation.md?plain=1#L80C660-L80C667) now redirects to [this website](https://www.naplesramada.com/) which is very much not about the portals policing project
